summary: Overrides the \"Solstheim\" text displayed on your saves and interface with the region or town you\'re currently in.
descriptionHtml:
This mod overrides the \"Solstheim\" text displayed on your saves and interface with the region or town you\'re currently in.

Currently, the regions implemented are:
-Ashlands
-Moesring Mountains
-Isinfier Plains
-Felsaad Coast
-Raven Rock
-Skaal Village

This mod edits weather regions, so it will not be compatible with mods that overhaul the weather on Solstheim.

Requires Dragonborn. But I\'m sure you already figured that out.

See [Url=file.php?id=15125]Unique Region Names[/url] for the Skyrim version.
author: Thingy Person

files.name: Unique Region Names - Dragonborn v1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Added compatibility patch for Climates of Tamriel
Properly marked the "Felsaad Coast" area
Corrected Insinfier Plain to Isinfier Plains
